rss.channel:
This Is My Son https://twitter.com/thisismyson Friends share their media boys with each other. Cathy Fisher © 2016 The Flavor Boys
en-us Sat, 6 Feb 2016 21:00:00 EDT Sat, 6 Feb 2016 21:00:00 EDT
å
It's son versus son in a battle royale of opinions and emotions. Friends share their media boys with each other.
Cathy Fisher cathy.a.fisher@gmail.com
This Is My Son Comedy, media, music, Guided by Voices, Lord Huron 1:13:46 #5: Guided by Voices v. Lord Huron (with Mark Popham) http://www.gooble.biz/timscast/005-Guided-by-voices-v-lord-huron.mp3 Mark brings '90s alternative lo-fi garage rock Guided by Voices to the table, along with his ambivalence about the band. Cathy ripostes with melodic Michigan boys Lord Huron. Also discussed: beard inheritance, Lena Dunham, Dean Quixote, and the beauty of lakes. Comedy Sun, 6 Mar 2016 23:00:00 EDT
No 005-Guided-by-voices-v-lord-huron.mp3
This Is My Son Comedy, media, entertainment, anime, Nichijou, Tim and Eric 1:13:46 #4: Nichijou v. Tim and Eric (with Mouse) http://www.gooble.biz/timscast/004-Nichijou-v-Tim-and-Eric.mp3 Mouse breaks precedent by proposing both her son (the anime Nichijou) and Cathy's son (Tim and Eric). Along the way, they spend a lot of time talking about different states, cultural context, and fear of inauthenticity. Comedy Sun, 28 Feb 2016 9:00:00 EDT
Yes 004-Nichijou-v-Tim-and-Eric.mp3
This Is My Son Comedy, media, entertainment, The Plague Dogs, The Science of Sleep 53:24 #3: The Plague Dogs v. The Science of Sleep (with Kris Jacque) http://www.gooble.biz/timscast/003-The-Plague-Dogs-v-The-Science-of-Sleep.mp3 Kris presents her son, The Plague Dogs, and Cathy counters with The Science of Sleep. We discuss the art and catharsis of the Sad Dog Story, why this podcast is #1 in the iTunes charts, and the dying art of horse tailoring. Comedy Sat, 20 Feb 2016 21:00:00 EDT
No 003-The-Plague-Dogs-v-The-Science-of-Sleep.mp3
This Is My Son Comedy, media, entertainment, One Direction, Barenaked Ladies 53:24 #2: One Direction v. Barenaked Ladies (with Whitney Reynolds) http://www.gooble.biz/timscast/002-One-Direction-v-BNL.mp3 Whitney presents her boy, One Direction. Cathy responds with Barenaked Ladies. Along the way they talk about fandom, betrayal, Morgan Spurnedlock, and Whitney gives us a bona fide 'sclusie! Comedy Sun, 14 Feb 2016 21:00:00 EDT
No 002-One-Direction-v-BNL.mp3
This Is My Son Comedy, media, entertainment, The Godfather, The Hunt for Red October, Sean Connery 1:07:40 #1: The Godfather v. The Hunt for Red October (with Max Eddy) http://www.gooble.biz/timscast/001-Godfather-v-October.mp3 Cathy presents her boy, The Godfather. Max responds with The Hunt for Red October. In the process they discuss offensive ethnic accents, gender representation, silent sea dongs, and submarine jetskis. Comedy Sat, 6 Feb 2016 21:00:00 EDT
No 001-Godfather-v-October.mp3
